_header: Saint Peter prince of apostles all
Note: For the usual version see 5800 and 6087.
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Peter, saint; Paul, saint
_description: ‘In festo sanctorum apostolorum Petri et Pauli’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: SAint peter prince of appostils allþat cristen men aw on to call…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Whare þai sall lif euer in lykingVnto þat blis ihesu us bring
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In festo sanctorum apostolorum Petri et Pauli (rubric, f. 152va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 62-76.
